name: Super Bottle Shoot
description:
The 3D effect of the game looks very realistic. You can shoot and break the bottles as many as you can within give time. Accuracy is the most important factor in any type of shooting, so you have to be very careful about it. If you like fun and addictive - Just aim and shoot!!


Features:
1. 3D graphics with realistic bottles.
2. Get ready for intense challenges.
3. Realistic sound of broken glass.
4. Challenge your friends and test who are the best shooters.
5. Simple and intuitive interface and controls
